maya/beastmayaplugin/include/resourcemanager.h
/*

#ifndef BEAST_RESOURCE_MANAGER_H
#define BEAST_RESOURCE_MANAGER_H

#include "mayautils.h"
#include "mayacallbacks/nodemessageobject.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastfundamentalswrapper.h"
#include <objbase.h>

namespace beastmaya {

        class PluginContext;

        struct MeshGeometry {
                std::vector<ILBVec3> vertices;
                std::vector<ILBVec3> normals;
                std::vector<ILBVec3> tangents;
                std::vector<ILBVec3> bitangents;
                std::vector<std::vector<ILBVec2>> uvs;
                std::vector<std::vector<int>> triangles;
                bool empty() {
                        return vertices.empty() || normals.empty() || uvs.empty() || triangles.empty();
                }
        };

        class ResourceManager {
        public:
                ResourceManager(PluginContext* bpc);
                ~ResourceManager();

                BeastMeshPtr createMesh(MDagPath dp, MObjectArray& surfaceShaders, const std::wstring& overrideName = L"", std::vector<unsigned int>* beastToMayaTriMapping = 0);
                
                BeastTexturePtr createTexture(MObject shader, std::wstring output, int width, int height, bool normalMap = false, bool flipHorizontally = false, bool flipVertically = false);

                BeastShaderPtr createShader(std::wstring fileName);

                BeastTexturePtr getBlackTexture();
                BeastTexturePtr getWhiteTexture();
                BeastTexturePtr createColorTextureLDR(unsigned char r, unsigned char g, unsigned char b);

        private:
                std::wstring getUniqueResourceName(MFnDependencyNode& node);
                std::wstring getMeshShaders(MFnMesh& mesh, unsigned int instanceNumber, MObjectArray& surfaceShaders);
                void getMeshGeometry(MFnMesh& mesh, unsigned int instanceNumber, MeshGeometry& meshGeometry, std::vector<unsigned int>* beastToMayaTriMapping);
                BeastMeshPtr exportMesh(const std::wstring& name, MeshGeometry& meshGeometry, MStringArray& shadersNames, MStringArray& uvSetNames);
                PluginContext* m_bpc;
                BeastTexturePtr m_blackTexture;
                BeastTexturePtr m_whiteTexture;

                std::unordered_map<MObject, NodeMessageObjectPtr> m_resourceCallbacks;

                
        };

}

#endif // BEAST_RESOURCE_MANAGER_H
